text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Okada was born in Kobe on August 11, 1926. He played for Kwangaku Club and Rokko Club. In March 1951, Okada was selected the Japan national team for Japan team first game after World War II, 1951 Asian Games. At this competition, on March 7, he debuted against Iran. He also played at 1954 Asian Games. He played 7 games for Japan until 1954.
